bsp_config.h File Reference

BSP header file containing globally used configuration. More...

Macros

#define BSP_VERSION_STRING   "PDK_01_10_02_xx"
 BSP package version string. Version is of the form mm_nn_xx_yy where, mm - Product version. This increments for any new BSP versions or platform. nn - Major number - Increments if any backward compatibility is broken or major change within a product version. xx - Minor number - Increments for any minor change or any additions done without breaking backward compatibility. yy - Build number - Increments for every release.
 
#define BSP_VERSION_NUMBER   ((UInt32) 0x01100200U)
 BSP package version number.

 Log enable for BSP Utils.

Functions

const Char * Bsp_getVersionString (void)
 Get the version string for the BSP package. More...
 
UInt32 Bsp_getVersionNumber (void)
 Same as Bsp_getVersionString() except it returns the version in UInt32 form. More...
 

Detailed Description

BSP header file containing globally used configuration.

Function Documentation

UInt32 Bsp_getVersionNumber ( void  )

Same as Bsp_getVersionString() except it returns the version in UInt32 form.

Example, v1.0.1.17 will be 0x01000117

Returns
BSP version number.
const Char* Bsp_getVersionString ( void  )

Get the version string for the BSP package.

This is the version number for all the drivers on BSP. This function can be called prior to Bsp_commonInit() to get the version number.

Returns
pointer to BSP version string.
